Package JSONTalk

package JSONTalk
  • Class
    Description
    descriptionLevel
    This enum assists the handling of command line arguments.
    jsonArray
    Used to hold information for both anonymous and named arrays
    jsonBaseVisitor<T>
    This class provides an empty implementation of jsonVisitor, which can be extended to create a visitor which only needs to handle a subset of the available methods.
    jsonCLI
    This class is responsible for parsing the command line options and arguments and producing the required description(s)
    jsonComplexElement
    jsonComplexElement is used to hold information for the two different complex elements: array and object To hold necessary hierarchical information, each jsonComplexElement has a list children of each type
    jsonDescriptorVisitor<T>
    This class provides an implementation of jsonVisitor.
    jsonElement
    Holds information about primitive jsonElements.
    jsonException
    jsonException class for exceptions
    jsonLexer
    Takes an input JSON file and tokenises it.
    jsonObject
    jsonObject is used to hold information for json object elements.
    jsonParser
    Generates an AST representation of a JSON file from the tokens produced from the jsonLexer
    jsonParser.ArrContext
    ParserRuleContext class for the array nodes within the JSON AST
    jsonParser.JsonContext
    ParserRuleContext class for the overall JSON file node (top node of the AST)
    jsonParser.ObjContext
    ParserRuleContext class for the object nodes of the JSON AST
    jsonParser.PairContext
    ParserRuleContextClass for the pair nodes within the JSON AST
    jsonParser.ValueContext
    ParserRuleContext class for the value nodes of the JSON AST
    jsonRun
    This class is responsible for the lexing and parsing of a JSON file, by calling the jsonLexer.lex() and jsonParser.parse() methods to generate a token stream and AST of the JSON file.
    jsonVisitor<T>
    This interface defines a complete generic visitor for a parse tree produced by jsonParser.
    TextToSpeech
    This class uses voices and a speech synthesis engine from FreeTTS to generate a synthesised speech output of a String.
